overview: “Love in Maastricht” was recorded with 28 cameras on three nights, capturing the most emotional moments on and off stage - It includes world famous songs and arias such as 'Nessun Dorma’ by Giacomo Puccini, 'Granada', 'You’ll Never Walk Alone', the 'Snowwaltz', and the 'Radetzky March'; global hits like 'Can’t Help Falling In Love', and goosebumps -inducing interpretations of 'You Raise Me Up' and 'Lara’s Theme' and of course ‘The Beautiful Blue Danube’ -
title: André Rieu - Love in Maastricht
